channel.title: Need help with thieving and item bonus on 317 server
channel.description: how do i change the money you get from thieving stalls on 317 server, and also, how do i change the bonus that dbow gives? cuz on my server it's overpowered. thank you.

item.title: Need help with thieving and item bonus on 317 server
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

If its Delta:

TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int [b]item[/b], int [b]itemAmount[/b], int emote)

For the Dark Bow, look in int maxRangeHit()

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with thieving and item bonus on 317 server
